'''Dance of Resolute Will''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.3]].

==Event Details==
{{Domain Infobox
|displaytitle = no
|mapicon      = Icon Dance of Resolute Will.png
|image        = Domain Dance of Resolute Will.png
|type         = Event
|region       = Fontaine
|area         = Belleau Region
|subarea      = West Slopes of Mont Automnequi
|requiredAR   = 20
|description  = Costentin has discovered a unique Domain, within which is hidden the stage constructed by the legendary "Blade Dancer" so many years ago. According to Costentin, when fighting on this stage, one can "set free a passionate hymn, praising the art that are the instincts of life."
}}

===Duration===
* 2024/01/10 10:00 - 2024/01/22 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"

===Summary===
* After the event begins, a challenge stage will unlock every day, with each one containing 2 combat rounds. Complete the challenges to obtain [[Primogem]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Weapon Enhancement Material]]s, and other rewards.
* The "Dance of Resolute Will" event comprises 5 challenges. After the event begins, a challenge stage will unlock every day, with each one containing 2 combat rounds.
* Lineups must be decided before the challenge. Both parties must share a character, while all other characters can only be used once.
* After you complete a Blade Dance objective during a challenge, you will obtain the Heightened Verve buff. While Heightened Verve is active, different opponent types will spawn, and defeating them will net you more points. Once that buff expires, you can once again complete a Blade Dance objective to regain the buff.

==Stages==
===I: Drumbeats in the Mountains===
{{Description|"A tough adversary only makes you stronger." The more powerful the opponents you face, the deeper you have to dig. Launch yourself at them and find your own sense of rhythm in the blade-dance...}}
Unlocks 2024-01-10 100{{Colon}}00

;Blade Dance Objectives
* Round 1: Trigger 15 Crystallize reactions on opponents
* Round 2: Defeat 6 opponents while protected by a shield

;Heightened Verve Buff
Heightened Verve lasts for 30s:<br>When a character triggers the Crystallize reaction, a Stone Shockwave will be unleashed at their location, dealing AoE Geo DMG and resonating with nearby Geo Constructs, releasing Stoneshard Shockwaves which deal AoE Geo DMG. The effect can be triggered once every 2s, and each time it is triggered, up to 2 Stoneshard Shockwaves can be produced.<br>While Heightened Verve is active, different opponent types will spawn, and defeating them will net you more points.
